entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Caller-Information-like Attribute to inspect nullability of generic type parameter values at runtime #64755
  • CS9057 The analyzer assembly references version '4.4.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.3.0.0' #64754
  • SourceGenerator: A way to include files from a dependant project? #64753

Closed

  • 'Go to Definition' Context-Menu option #64702
  • StringSyntax only applies to the first string argument when used with params. #64756

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor LSP server exit / shutdown / dispose logic for resiliency and clarity #64752
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • VB: Align design around speculative semantic models with C#. #64751
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64759
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Recover from the Exception in IdleProcessor #64746
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE
